about_the_game:
Technology Book

This technology themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by technology from the past, present, and future; expect to see breakthroughs from the stone age through to the space age.

Contents

The Technology book unlocks the following images:
  • Chemicals - 23x27
  • Robotics - 30x47
  • Fire - 48x44
  • Tools - 52x46
  • Circuit Boards - 61x61
  • Farming - 71x84
  • Plumbing - 81x59
  • Rocketry - 93x122
  • Phonograph - 100x100
  • Retro Gaming - 109x71
  • Books - 124x67
  • Aqueducts - 150x150
  • Steam Power - 168x180
  • Airships - 196x125
  • Drones - 200x200
  • Cloud Computing - 215x212
  • Automobiles - 219x137
  • Cloning - 270x177
  • Urbanization - 285x160
  • Renewable Energy - 300x300

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Technology Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: Unlocks the Technology themed book for Coloring Pixels. Includes 20 new tech themed levels to complete! Inspired by technology from the past, present, and future; experience the evolution of technology from the stone age to the space age!
